item.description:
This is a cross listing of the Active Singles hike that our single members might like to attend. Please follow the link below to get to the Active Singles meetup site to get more information and to RSVP if you are interested. You cannot RSVP here on the Hartford Area Hiking site.

http://www.meetup.com...



Hike starts at 9:30AM sharp, please arrive at 9:00AM and will last approximately 2 hours

Please bring Hiking Boots & Water - Sunscreen recommended

*NO KIDS - NO DOGS - NO SNEAKERS* Singles Only 30s-60s

For those of you new to Active Singles, please check-in with Charlie upon arrival (baseball cap and bright colored shirt)

We hike at four different group levels:
Social Pace
Moderate Fast Pace
Advance Pace
Expert Pace

After hike lunch ($12-$13 includes tax & tip), Charlie will provide details and location at hike.

Please contact Charlie with any questions:
203-271-2125 (Home)
860-489-9611 (Cell)

group.name: The Hartford Area Hikingâ„¢ Meetup Group

item.name: Active Singles: Roaring Brook Hike - Cheshire, CT
